enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SELECT count(1) FROM format_recovery where enterprise_id = #{id}
and recovery_enterprise LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%')

SELECT FROM format_recovery where enterprise_id = #{id}
and recovery_enterprise LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') order by id desc
